description: This file defines a Fragment class for displaying weather forecast information in an Android application. It manages UI binding, interacts with a ViewModel to fetch forecast data, and updates the UI accordingly.

classes.name: ForecastFragment
classes.description: A Fragment responsible for displaying weather forecast data, managing UI elements and binding with its ViewModel.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the layout for the fragment and sets up view binding.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets up UI elements and launches a coroutine to observe forecast state from the ViewModel.

methods.name: onDestroyView
methods.description: Cleans up view binding when the fragment's view is destroyed.
